```{r libraries}

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

```

```{r upload data}

dataAugur2022 <- read_excel("DataAuger2022.xlsx", na = "NA")   #import data from last year project (36 augur in the P16)
dataBotany2022 <- read_excel("DataAuger2022.xlsx", na = "NA", sheet = "Data Giacomo")  #import botany data





Augur <- dataAugur2022 %>% select(c("Texture corrigée 2023", "racines", "sondage N°"))  #make shorter dataset with only variables we will use
```

```{r}
dataAugur2022 %>% filter(`Numéro horizon` == 1) %>% count()  #36
```
